title: Figure 3: Impact of main components on the households and non-profit insitutions serving households (NPISH) saving ratio
subtitle: Quarter 4 (Oct to Dec) 2012 to Quarter 3 (July to Sept) 2016
notes: 1. Q1 refers to Quarter 1 (Jan to Mar), Q2 refers to Quarter 2 (Apr to June), Q3 refers to Quarter 3 (July to Sept) and Q4 refers to Quarter 4 (Oct to Dec).
altText: The fall in the saving ratio was due to rises in individual consumption expenditure and taxes on income and wealth.
